UserOptionDefinition.Device_ItemShop_V2_C.EnabledOnPhase.Desc: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-Game includes all phases prior to the Game starting (the waiting for players lobby on Featured Islands and the Game Start Countdown).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ItemShop_V2_C.InteractTime.Descri: Determines the length of interaction required to activate the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Store_C.Disable.Description: Disables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Store_C.Enable.Description: Enables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Store_C.OpenStore.Description: Opens the Store for the triggering player when receiving on the selected channel.
